title: What lane and role will the next champion have?
body: I would just like to know if the next champion is a mage/marksman/assassin/fighter/tank, and what lane he will go.

replies.body: I'd have to guess it being a tank or support.  It could be a mage support, as Bard is the closest thing to a mage support that came out "recently," and he came out in early 2015.

Next hero is gonna be a carpenter.  He will build little fortifications all over the map all game and get xp from building things.  His gold will come from rent that allies pay when using his fortifications.
I want a really cool support champion but he will prob end up mid or jungle since that lane is stale af
